website_summaries.verdict: What do you get for the discriminating cat who has never forgotten that his kind were once worshipped as gods in Ancient Egypt? Why, a bed as divine as he is, of course. This handcrafted felted wool bed is sure to be Fluffy's favorite snoozing spot.
pros: Handcrafted from natural wool by artisans in Nepal, this is not your everyday cat bed
It's roomy enough for even the largest feline and provides the warm, soft, dark hiding spot that kitties crave
Sturdy enough to hold its shape as Fluffy goes in or out
Yet soft enough to gently collapse into a cozy sleeping mat if your cat prefers to doze in the open
Natural wool repels odors, stains, and dirt
cons: It's definitely a splurge, but the bed's good looks, and your cat's haughty-yet-loving gaze, will convince you it's worth it

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made My 2 Cats Love it Both in Winter & Summer
customer_reviews.text: My two rescue cats absolutely love this Cave. One is a slender 9 pounds and th other is a robust 13 pounds. Both cats fit into it with room to spare. They enjoy it during the winter to stay warm and the summer for cool shade. A well made product and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bear's Kub Kave
customer_reviews.text: "Bear" the kitty involved hates all the beds I have bought him. He will drag them to the center of the room and flip it over to show his disdain. Then I bought this wool kubbi and he immediately went in and made it his own. He loves it...and I didn't have to tempt him in with catnip sprinkled inside or anything.
customer_reviews.author: John Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Kubbi Love
customer_reviews.text: My KittiKubbi arrived ridiculously quickly, practically within hours of submitting my order. It was pretty much love at first sight--my little guys knew instantly what to do. They took turns inspecting and then delightedly climbing in, nestling in, and now it's a permanent fixture in the living room. Looks like I'll be needing another one to prevent them fighting over it! As an added bonus, it's also stylishly modern and better looking than most cat beds.
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: Definite Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through $100's on different cat beds... and throughout my ordeal my cat simply prefers a pair of dirty jeans to anything store bought. That is.. until now. She warmed right up to this "Cat Cave". No matter where I put it... in the living room, in the bedroom, even on my desk while I'm working at home - it's her go-to place to sleep. It holds shape fairly well, is easy for my cat to climb in and out of, and from what I can tell is fairly warm and spacious on the inside (my cat is 16lbs and not all that fat). What can I say... she loves it, and my jeans stay cleaner longer!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Play time AND Nap time!
customer_reviews.text: For all sizes! I have two 4 lb kittens (who curl up in it and play in it together) and a 15 lb cat who also loves to cuddle up in this! Highly recommend... they were drawn to it immediately - i was a little worried about the single entrance/exit (multiple cat household), but because the hole is front and center? it doesn't seem to have the "caught by surprise" element of a larger cat house with only one entry/exit. LOTS of playing and napping and yes, sometimes it's squished flat and provides a cozy saucer shape bed!
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: This is well made and beautiful. Sadly all three cats aren’t interested
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and beautiful. Sadly all three cats aren’t interested. They lay on it, flat every so often but that’s it. ***Revising this to say that even though my cats weren’t that into it, I gave it to my sister. And her cats who are both seriously enormous somehow manage to both jam themselves into and on top of it. This may have been helped along by the makers of the bed sending me some Kitty Krack (cat nip I think, but extra nippy) when they saw my initial review. I sprinkled it onto the bed before I gifted it to sister. In any case, JACKPOT. Cats in heaven. 😻
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves it
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a cat I have a nine pound pomchi (dog)who is always in search of a nice little dark place to call her own, I think we found it. The material feels of good durable quality as soon as set her new home down she had already jumped it and claimed it. I placed a little blanket inside to add a bit more padding
customer_reviews.author: thor

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it. First cat bed I've ever bought that they actually use
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes of unpacking and putting this on the ground, one of my 2 cats was already inside it getting comfortable. 5 hours have passed now and within that time at least one cat has been inside this thing at all times. In short, this is a hit with my cats, they clearly love it. I've already ordered a second one because I can tell they're not going to be willing to share this thing :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: first "cat house" to win vs. the shipping box
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats, Larry, took to it right away and proclaimed it his. I kept the box it came in right next to the cat cave, b/c preferring anything over the box it came in, is really the ultimate test. It took several days before he paid any attention to the box. The other cat, Bleeker, warmed up to it this weekend, and now I feel like I need a 2nd one for Bleeker, too. I consider this a winner, and would have ordered 2 up front, if they weren't so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Vautrot

customer_reviews.title: As soon as I unpacked this beautiful big pocket of a hide out cave for my ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! As soon as I unpacked this beautiful big pocket of a hide out cave for my sweet Sassi cat....She immediately went in and took over. She LOVES this cave. I can't believe how big it is. The color is so bright and pretty too. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: sooner

customer_reviews.title: Old cat of 20 loves this bed.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and although it took 3 months, my old cat of 20 decided she not only likes it, but really loves it. I just left it on the bed, near her other bed and finally she decided this one was the one she liked.
customer_reviews.author: GAD

customer_reviews.title: Sort of worked out
customer_reviews.text: Nice workmanship. Bought it for my two small female cats. Unfortunately my large male cat just sits on it and flattens it. He seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M Kirk.

customer_reviews.title: Now we have 2 "caves"  and glad of it.  Both kitty boys spend a lot of time in them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one to see if either of my cats would like it. Result: both of them want "in" many times a day. One likes the "cave" aspect and the younger one likes to squish it down to a regular looking pet bed (and to bite and scratch it, too). I just ordered a second one to avoid sibling rivalry. A great product and well worth the cost for my boys.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat likes roughly 20 percent of whatever we buy him. We doubted he'd take to this, but minutes after we set it down, he started sniffing around it and went right inside for a long nap. We tried flattening it out to use it as a sort of kitty couch, and he looked for the entrance hole and tried to squeeze inside. Our cat is a big boy - around 20 pounds - and the large size is ideal. The opening of this size is about a foot in diameter. There's plenty of room inside, but it's still cozy. Suffice it to say that this has been a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: MeDC

customer_reviews.title: Purrrrfect Choice!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old boy loves his cat cave! I sat with this in my cart for quite a while because it is a little expensive for a cat bed, but this has turned out to be worth it and more. My cat loves it so much he even chases his tail in it! He likes to hang out inside the cave but will also squish it and sleep on top of it. The material is soft but sturdy and is high quality. The cave is roomy and has plenty of space for the cat, who is definitely on the larger side. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and the cat is as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My extremely picky cat LOVES her cat cave!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I know cats love wool?! It's itchy feeling and not that big. She's 14lbs and likes to stretch out. My cat is literally the most picky cat I've ever known so I was positive she wouldn't like this. Immediately she got in and stayed in. Why oh why have I spent countless dollars on other cat caves?! Won't make that mistake again. I think I know some other kitties getting these cat cave for Christmas. Pretty awesome product. Came really fast too. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Kudos for your "pretty please" reminder to rate. Excellent marketing! My two boys love this bed, which is beautifully made. When one is inside, the other eyes the bed wistfully. I'd have more of them, but this particular model has an opening that isn't ideal on a sofa or easy chair, where nearly all my other fur beds sit. But yours does have pride of place in my living room on the floor close to the heat vent.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: Fits the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a momma cat and her 4 babies I'm fostering. She likes enclosed spaces, but I wanted to make sure I got something big enough for her and all the babies to fit in so they could nurse. Momma loved it immediately, the babies needed about a day to investigate, but now they all love this thing, both in its pod form and squished as a bed. The kittens love climbing in and on it and momma clearly finds it very cozy. It seems well made and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cat cave
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES little caves and tents. If I have a blanket over my legs, she has to sneak underneath the little canopy and snuggle in the darkness. Her favorite spot to sleep is in the closet in the space between the ironing board leaning against the wall. This cat bed is a snuggly little cave, perfect for a cat like mine. Does she like it? No. Does she go inside? Once a year. Not sure why the perfect bed for her gets ignored but it's still a high quality cat bed that looks nice in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: love It!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Came quickly and well packaged. The wool is very thick and feels durable. My little buddy has an affinity for textures and, immediately after getting into his new shark, began to dig/scratch/bunny-kick. I was pleased to find not a single pill or snag! In the stock photo, the opening for the shark looked a bit smaller than the others so I was a bit concerned, but the size is more than generous enough for my large tabby. It’s a hit so far!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Win-win!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat took one sniff and climbed right in. A few more sniffs and she lay down. The texture reminds me of a wool heavy coat I had once. We had a cat bed in a spot where she could watch my daughter on the computer but it was drafty and the old bed didn't have a top. The cat cave is much better for keeping her warm and blocking the draft. Both my daughter and her cat seem to love it! Win-win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was instant love
customer_reviews.text: My big boy and my little girl love this except big boy doesn’t want little girl in there with him lol. Although they both fit comfortably, he wants it all for himself. My little girl claimed it with her natural kitten curiosity as soon as I sat it on the floor. I’ve bought her cat huts and she’s showed no interest. My big boy can’t fit in the cat huts but this cave is perfect!! Long story short... my babies love their cave
customer_reviews.author: foohtmooht

customer_reviews.title: i have FIVE of them now.
customer_reviews.text: ALL MY CATS LOVE THESE - Careful of the Bobby Pin.. its small and seems kinda cheap ( the BOBBY PIN ).. it bends Very EAsily.. Dont want my Cats getting stabbed w/ it. Could basically leave it out imho. Also the cloth bag it comes in. MY cats wrap their necks around everything.. I toss it Very quickly. Also the Large Plastic bag it comes in i get rid of quickly.. My Cats are in these ALL the time.. they love them. I might need SIX.. haha.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves his new bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves his Kittie Kubbi! He likes to jump inside and hide and play and sleep. He also loves to smush it down and sleep on top of it. This has been a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Koue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful snuggle beds!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my Siamese cats...they love to be together in a bed. They especially love to be snuggly and warm. I ended up buying two because they simply would not share these beds. They arrived and I was thrilled at how beautifully made they were. Each cat gets in them and just snooze in the sun. They are larger than I thought, which is a really good thing. I have only had them for a week, but I know my cats love them.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: The best cat cave ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Made really well. They are very roomy and there is lots of space for one or more cats to snuggle up. The cats took to them right away. One even claimed it as "her own" before any of the other cats had tiime to check it out. I HIGHLY recommend getting these for your cats or dogs. I have 3 cats and I only bought two of these. I will have to get one more to keep the peace between them. Thank you for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Jones

customer_reviews.title: You and YOUR CAT will loves this !!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality, is superb. High end product for such great price. Unique for animas.. As stated before you can't go wrong with this kitty cave.. I can totally see a small little dog making this its home as well.. I totally can see a mama pet cradling her young inside with her... It would warm enough as well.. Check out the stitching and material and you will agree this isn't cheaply made! Customer service is beyond great !
customer_reviews.author: Super Mommy!

customer_reviews.title: My cats have entered the feline world wrestling federation over this cat cave bed
customer_reviews.text: This cat cave bed deserves 10 stars. My two cats tumble and rumble daily with each other to the point I think they are going to tear each other apart just so one of them can win the honor of curling up in this bed. I am debating getting a second one. This is the ONLY cat bed I've ever purchased that a cat actually liked.
customer_reviews.author: T. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 cats like it!
customer_reviews.text: Two of my cats like this cat bed. The third cat can't be bothered, because he has a King sized bed that he only occasionally has to share with me. But he's old and has never cared for any bed or toy that I've bought him, so I can't say I'm surprised. My youngest cat (not quite 4 years) absolutely loves it. I must say it seems quite a bit bigger than a similar cat bed that I also bought from another company, but I haven't actually measured them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cats took to it right away
customer_reviews.text: Our cats loved this right away and have gone from sitting and play inside of it to smashing it down and sitting on top as well. I bought this one because it was a little larger than some others and I thought maybe both cats could be inside at the same time. I think that would work fine for kittens but even for our small cats this won't work. Still love the item though -- doesn't smell at all and the cave is really pliable so you can flatten it for storage if you need. Seller has been very communicative too -- we may be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kroman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Just Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried when I got the bed in the mail because it was all squished down flat. However, it popped back into shape easily. It's very durable yet still soft enough for the cat... and she loves it! It's also just the right size and fits perfectly in her hiding spot. I was also thrilled to get a couple of bonus treats for her, too; a little felt tennis ball and a can of "Kitty Crack" which she also loves. Thank you so much. Nice job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not Be Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very pleased with this product. It's made from heavy pressed wool, has no scent, is large enough for two cats and is beautifully constructed. Can be used as a cave or bowl - your cat will decide.
customer_reviews.author: Kris in Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 rescue kitties and they both love this cave. It’s large enough for both of them and they are 10 pounds each. Since Olivia is not too big on sharing (see video), I just ordered another one to reduce the “attacks” you see on the video. They seem to like the mouth because it covers the entry point and provides the perfect hiding, sleeping, attack your sister spot. This cave gets a lot of compliments and looks really great in your home. If you find it a little too big, just throw a little blanket in there and let your cat do the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! So happy I got this for our cats! They LOVE the KittyKubbi! They don't like sitting in it together but both enjoy taking turns or will snuggle on top of it together :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves her cat cave
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if my cat would like the cat cave but as soon as I unwrapped it she went inside and seems to love it. She will also collapse the cave and lay on top. The cave is very flexible and also very sturdy. I have not washed it yet so don't know how that will be. I would buy it again but I have a feeling this will last a very long time. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Valerius

customer_reviews.title: Both my kitties love their Twin Critters Cat Cave and were using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Both my kitties love their Twin Critters Cat Cave and were using it within a half hour my taking it out of its packaging. And speaking of packaging, it was excellent in that my Twin Critters Cat Cave came with it's own, cotton drawstring bag. But back to the Cat Cave, it looks just like the picture and while you could collapse the Cat Cave if you and your cat wanted a cushy surface to lay on, it totally stays erect (and in the shape sown in the picture) all on it's own. My kitties and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mlofftus

customer_reviews.title: I'm really surprised but she lost interest.
customer_reviews.text: My cat lived in this thing for like 5 days. Now she never uses it. It was a fun five days. The quality is great. The first one I received was smelly. I had bought several because I have sisters. Theirs didn't smell. So I swapped mine out for a new one. Other than that I'm blown away by the quality. And I was blown away by how much my cat loved it right up until the day she just quit using it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the look of this product and was excited when ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this product and was excited when it arrived, but there were a few problems: 1. It simply didn't want to hold its shape. It would slowly cave in on itself, and the cats would use it as a bed instead of hide-away 2. It sheds Ultimately my cats were too scared to go inside after it regularly caved in and one day I came home to find they had peed on it, so it went down the garbage chute.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep its shape.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: after maybe 3 months it completely slouches down. Didn’t keep it’s shape at all. So disappointed as this wasn’t cheap. I was hesitant to buy this due to the cost. That was until I saw the shark option. I had to have it. It came SO quickly. The quality is beautiful. Very well made. Thick wool. It was worth the price tag. I thought I would have to buy a pillow to put inside but bc the material is thick, I actually might just use it as is.
customer_reviews.author: Legit Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: They like the large size
customer_reviews.text: I bought two at the same time, one medium and one large; one each for my two cats. The larger cat is 17 lbs and the smaller 15 lbs. I have had them for 8 days. The large cave is definitely more popular. I am keeping the medium one, though, hoping they will get used to it. As for me, I love them both. As other buyers have said, they are beautiful, all natural, well-made objects that support artisans in a far away place. I love having them in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McHugh

customer_reviews.title: I love it and my two cats immediately got inside
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my two cats immediately got inside...and then promptly exited and haven't shown any interest in it since then. I was hoping this was the one but it wasn't meant to be. One of my cats is 18 lbs and he easily fit inside of it, for those that are worried about a larger cat being able to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: Picky cats love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have two 5-yr old male cats who are unbelievably picky about where they will sleep. They're both huge ... around 20 lb each. I purchased 2 cat caves, hoping this would finally be the solution. Both cats absolutely love them now (it took them about half an hour before they couldn't resist checking them out). Apparently I've made a wise decision with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SandStorm

customer_reviews.title: Cute but unused
customer_reviews.text: My cats completely refuse to use this. I've tried catnip and their favorite rugs. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: Una the Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad purchase. The felt comes off easily, the bed doesn’t stand up, our cat hated it. Ended up throwing it away because the felt loss was creating holes.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey K McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: prior to getting this amazing cave bed she hid under everything
customer_reviews.text: I have an older rescue cat that is very timid and skittish, prior to getting this amazing cave bed she hid under everything, beds, end tables etc. Now she sits in her little cave watching the world go by. She took to it right away and it clearly makes her feel safe and secure allowing her to hang out with our family more. BEST THING EVER. And the quality is superb, well crafted with quality materials. Will be buying more for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: momdebo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping at least one of my two cats would like it. Well, they embraced it immediately and have been spending time throughout the day using it. It is very good quality. My husband says I should buy another so there will not be fighting... I am giving it some thought. If you wonder if it's worth the price...it is- buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best of three!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 cat caves, each from a different company, and this is the best one. Near-odorless, thick, high quality wool, dyed a gorgeous blue. Entry hole positioned slightly upward and just the right size. Interior large enough for both my 11- lb cats, though they usually take turns. Very important: it also arrived folded twice (triple wrapped), yet opened it holds its shape and looks less creased and wrinkled than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Artisanal work for kitties and home.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a well-made a beautiful hand-crafted product... it looks lovely in my home and my kitties will enjoy it through summer and winter in our mountain home. It is roomier and more attractive in person than in the photos. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: The cat’s meow (shark’s teeth)!
customer_reviews.text: This is stunning and beautifully made. Could easily hold two kitties (though ours is just for one medium-size sassy geriatric feline). Plenty of room to add a cushion or small throw. Was an immediate hit: she climbed in, had a seat, and began grooming while meowing contentedly. Also makes the humans happy. Comes with a bouncy wool ball that she loves batting around and nuzzling.
customer_reviews.author: QP

customer_reviews.title: Twin critters cat bed
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our morkie, she is about 12lbs. I know its ment for cats, this dog loves to go under the drapes. I thought this might help her cuddle. We have put treats into it and she love to hunt them. It's been very warm in AZ. I know she will use it this fall and winter. It's not just for cats. Small dogs love it too. We also have two cats that will get one when there bed wares out. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: dianna ready

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product! I placed it in a closet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product! I placed it in a closet, because one of ours likes dark places, and I found her sitting in it before I got a chance to show it to her. She seems very content to peer out through the hole, and now sleeps in it (after I put a soft rug underneath it). Yes, we spoil our four-footed friends. {This is Kathy's husband.}
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the reviews about other people's cats taking to this bed right away I was skeptical. Now that I've received my own, I'm a believer. My cat took this to this right away and heslept in it three times today. So if you're on the fence about spending the extra money for the Cocoon of a bed, I would recommend that you go for it.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan greene

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitten!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just gave the Kittenkubbi to my girlfriend for Christmas. She took it home and I've received the best videos and pictures of her 10 month old kitten absolutely loving it. The team at Kittenkubbi reached out to me after my purchase to make sure I was happy. Really glad I spent the money on this. Truly a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: Collapses almost instantly :(
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than expected and doesn’t stay open like how it’s displayed in the picture. It collapses almost instantly so my cat can’t even crawl inside it. The material is good and I can tell it’s high quality- just doesn’t keep its shape. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: My cat absolutely loves this cat cave and I love that it has an earth artistic feel
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this cat cave and I love that it has an earth artistic feel. Doesn't look obtrusive with the décor like the cardboard boxes I have kept around for her pleasure in the past. :) You can't go wrong with this item. I will probably end up getting a second one for another area in the house. Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Bengal Kitten Cave
customer_reviews.text: Our bengal kitten LOVES this cat cave! He slept in it the night we brought him home and even though he’s more of a tree dweller we keep this at the bottom of his tree and he uses it as an ambush point, a safe spot and and well...sometimes a toy. Its well made and rugged enough to last. Decently soft for wool. There’s something about the texture our guy loves. It’s a five star item but only gets four because it’s damn expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves his pod!
customer_reviews.text: Initially this pod was a bit of a shocker when I first pulled it out of its packaging, followed with another surprise after setting it on the floor. I thought "what the heck is this wooly thing?", and "this is one odd and ugly cat cave". But when my 22 pound cat went in to check it out and immediately curled up inside, I was sold on the design thanks to my cat's acceptance of his new safe pod. Seeing my cat's seal of approval transformed my outlook. In less than a week, I find it's shape naturally simple and lightweight for handling. Love this unique product!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy O.

customer_reviews.title: Immediately Loved
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought two cat beds - this one and a completely different one - thinking my cat who loved to burrow would like the other. Nope. They both want this one. They ignore the other completely. Within a night they somehow destroyed one of the eyes by shredding it and a week later the teeth have been mangled because the young cats are rough, but the bed holds up and they still dearly love it. The picture is from hour one, before they shredded the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Stacimus

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: My rescue cat adores it! He figured out immediately that was his new favorite spot. Thank you Twin Critters. I love your selection of wholesome and natural products. Keep them coming.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it! No scared of it break in period.
customer_reviews.text: My cats took right to this! The younger ones just swarmed it. They can't decide if they want a cave or to lay on top. Sometimes both. It's thick, heavy wool. It will hold its shape open. If the cats lay on top you can easily pop it back open. Two can just squeeze in. Going to need a couple more. The color is as pictured, heathered, dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiOK

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but cat doesn't go in.
customer_reviews.text: The piece is amazing, we have seen other cats using it. My cat doesn't use it for some reason. Otherwise it will be 5 Stars. We trick him with Catnip, it's the only way he can get in :P
customer_reviews.author: Manuela Canotilho

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It just came yesterday, I barely got it out of the box and my 12 year old cat was in it! He seems to really enjoy it. Definitely, a great find! Will be ordering another one for my other cat!
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful cat bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cat bed. The problem is that my cat Midnight does not like cat beds. I had to fold it down so it is a round cup sort of bed. He now sleeps in it. Not all the time, but sometimes. And, he doesn't like going into things. I find new things all the time that he doesn't like to do. I guess I should have asked him before I bought it.....Cats........love them all.........such a gift to humans.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Stevie absolutely loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for Stevie, my brother's cat, and Stevie absolutely loves it! Apparently, he immediately jumped inside -- and stayed inside -- for at least three hours. And maybe he was inside his KittiKubbi even longer, but that's when my brother had to stop emailing me with updates and do something more constructive instead . . . Other family members who were visiting my brother and his family at the time and also have a cat decided that they were going to order a KittiKubbi immediately, too! It was described to me as the "best gift of the whole day," which is great, but now how can I top that for next year?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She does enjoy sleeping in it
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Maine Coon cat who fits in this with even some room to spare! She does enjoy sleeping in it, however, she enjoys playing in it. When she is in what I call, full Maniac Cat mode, she thoroughly loves racing across my tiled living room floor and diving into it head first, which then causes it to slide at nice clip across the floor into my home theater stand. She then turns around and flies back out of it at top, Maniac Cat speed! I just love watching her do that!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lees

customer_reviews.title: Our cat jumped right into it on opening the bag!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but this is a great product from very responsive sellers. My cat loves this cat cave. She plays in it, hangs out in it, and sleeps in it. The little felted ball that came with the bed was a plus- she loves rolling around in the cat cave with the ball. The colors and style make this a beautiful, modern accessory for your home! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ross

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves this
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure my cat would like this, but she often sleeps soundly in her little hut. It's a great size for her, but she is a fairly small cat. Not really for large kitties. It is a very safe enclosure for her, and I add towels for some extra padding. Very adorable!
customer_reviews.author: LibraCyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sphynx cats! Very spacious
customer_reviews.text: This is very spacious cat bed. I have a sphynx and they are as a breed always cold, I’ve tried many variations of cat beds, this one is the best so far. I thought it might be not soft enough for his skin, since he has very gentle/sensitive skin, but he actually loves rolling in/on it. Pro: - spacious - cozy and warm - perfect for sphynx - durable Cons: - pricey - not sure yet how to wash it
customer_reviews.author: A.Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cool Design
customer_reviews.text: Could be your cat's next home, but not ours. While they are cool to look at our cat just didn't take to it. She went in it maybe 3 times. part of it could maybe be because it wouldn't stay open all the way- the roof would partially collapse when moved or jostled. We ended up giving it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Keeperofkeys

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love this!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as this was this out of the package, my kittens were in it! This is larger than I expected and very good quality. They have even learned to open it after it's been flattened. I believe this will last a long time and they will use it often. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tleet

customer_reviews.title: Need another because cats fight over it
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I need to get a second one. My tow cats love this thing. One like to flatten it out and the other likes to crawl inside. They both want it at night time. I rarely get items that are popular with both cats. The shark one is adorable for pics too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baugher

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed
customer_reviews.text: This item is lovely. It is beautifully made and my cats love it. Having had contact directly with the manufacturer, I cannot say enough wonderful things about their customer service and attention to detail. We worked out a complicated issue and all is well. Be very careful when you order this item. Make sure that it is being shipped from Twin Critters and not a third party seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnycat

customer_reviews.title: Safe haven for kitties
customer_reviews.text: My extremely particular cat warmed up to this immediately. As an older, arthritic kitty, she feels insecure and this bed helps. Easy to clean with a moist sponge or a quick vacuum. If she sits on top, it easily pops out to a cave again. One of the best purchases I've made for my feline friend.
customer_reviews.author: SMM

customer_reviews.title: Kitty says "perfection!"
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had been sleeping in a plastic storage container that had tissue paper in it for weeks... like alllll day long she would sleep in this box. I got this and put it right beside the box and within seconds she jumped out of the box and into this. She's been in for hours now, so needless to say, it's been an instant hit in our house!
customer_reviews.author: A. Goings

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: for sure the best cat bed i've ever found. it's so hard to get cats to actually use the things we get them... but they love these caves! the eyes wore off pretty quick on the first shark i got, but i reached out to the company directly and they were SO quick to respond and sent me a whole new one. killer support, super cute, high quality, and my cats love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Rekasis

customer_reviews.title: Cat Cave
customer_reviews.text: Wow my 2 Ragdolls love this thing. Just ordered a second one because the 10 week old kitten won’t get out of it so her brother can give it a try. It’s a great little cat cave! They also love the little wool ball that was included. Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: The boys love them
customer_reviews.text: I now am the proud owner of 2 of these! I originally purchased the grey one thinking only 1 of my 2 boys would like it. I was wrong! So instead of they kicking each other out of 1, they can rotate sleeping either in them or on them.
customer_reviews.author: J Deyarman

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cute cat bed. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute cat bed. I have a Maine coon who is 15 pounds and it's big enough for her. My kitty loves it. First time she saw it she jumped in it and scratched around. I guess she wanted to make sure that it was hers. The cat bed was rocking back-and-forth. She's a goober. Thank you for the cat bed.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Cat-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: Well made cat cave/bed/pod. Sturdy, felted wool, good construction, seamless. I took it out of the box, put it on top of our bed, and the intended recipient crawled right in. You can also compress the pod into a nest; this is the form her pushy sister prefers. There haven't been any outright slap-fights over who sleeps in/on the pod (at least, none that I've witnessed), but I'm going to order another one of these just in case. Highly recommended for cats who like to burrow under bed linens or find hiding spots for a snooze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Cats are picky - we all know that! I thought my cat would love this as a cave or hideout, but she wouldn't go near it. I left it near her favorite hangouts for weeks, but no, she wasn't going to risk going into that dark hole. Then I flipped it over, flattened it, and now she will hardly leave it! I guess she is more of a nest-cat, not a cave-cat. Fabric is nice thick felt, feels good and the cat seems very comfortable curled up in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicolai

customer_reviews.title: cats love
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and all have been using 2 like to sit inside the cave and one likes to sit on top and they do like to jump on the one that is inside and scare that cat so its a bed, cave and a game very nice, well made and my cats are happy what more could you want great product
customer_reviews.author: dat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product for a week so can't comment re: how well it resists stains, etc. What I CAN say is that it is every bit as beautiful as the picture suggests - much nicer than the typical pet bed or scratching post. One of my three kitties (the one most inclined to hide in cubbies) started using it almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: H.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cat Cave
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. They began using it immediately, almost before I got the plastic off! At first they weren't very interested in going inside the cave, but after sitting on it for a few weeks and putting a few toys inside they started trying out the inside of it. Looks great when not in use, and holds its shape well. One of the few cat beds they keep coming back to!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I like it and my cats like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it and my cats like it. Thick, firm, pretty color and large enough. However, I need to buy one more cave, but they said they don't have any more stock except teal flower which I don't like. I wish they made enough stock since it is holiday shopping season. I tried cat geeks cave and liked the color but it is not thick. So I will try meowfia cave since some people recommended them to me and if we still think kittikubbi is better, I will wait until they have enough stock.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: One of my cats won’t leave it! And loves to play in it!
customer_reviews.text: Cats don’t use it at all. My cats usually love wool, just not this for some reason. UPDATE: MONTHS LATER I PUT IN ON TOP OF A DRESSER AND $5 CAT BED (to add cousin) AND ONE OF MY KEEBOYS SLEEPS AND PLAYS IN IT EVERY DAY! VERY PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: John D. Munger

customer_reviews.title: Best 100 bucks I ever spent on my cats.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. I bought two caves. My cats LOVE them. The caves are big enough for two cats to curl up inside, but if your cats are at all territorial, like mine can be sometimes, I recommend one for each cat. The quality is top notch felted wool. I got the grey rock-looking ones, which seem to grow out of my grey slate floors. It's a cool esthetic. Overall, pricey, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! My cat absolutely loves this!! She's had it for 2 days & so far hasn't actually slept in it. She mostly plays in it! She climbs inside, scratches the sides & then starts running in circles inside of it! It's hilarious! Came with a little wool ball that she carries around & leaves next to my pillow when she's done playing. Worth every penny just watching her play in it!! High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked the cat cave, placed it on the floor, called my cat over, he mowed at me and went right in. He loves it!! He also likes the ball that came with it. I have a large 17 lb Maine Coon and there is plenty of room for him. I'm so happy with this purchase. It's very nicely made as well.
customer_reviews.author: A C F

customer_reviews.title: Good for small cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely made, high-quality product. It ended up being too small for my cat (a very large maine coon), but we have another cat in the family who has taken a shine to the hideout. It's more attractive than most pet toys or furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R. Barker

customer_reviews.title: love reading the reviews for this- people that have cats ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, love reading the reviews for this- people that have cats are hilarious... This very soft hidey-hole was barely out of the bag before one of my cats got in. She was forced out by my other cat and he curled up in there for the rest of the evening. The cats are collectively about 25 pounds and they would both be able to fit comfortably but in my house they only let one wear the crown at a time. So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: It has been especially great during recent freezing weather
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with her new bed, she just loves it. It has been especially great during recent freezing weather, and I feel better knowing that she has somewhere really warm and cosy to curl up while I am at work. This is definitely one of the best purchases I have made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: cats approve
customer_reviews.text: They should show a picture of a cat laying on top on this thing. My cats continually pounce on the top causing it to stay in the collapsed form. I gave up trying to fix it for them. They seem to prefer to lay on it like a rug. It is well made. I was thinking about bending some kind of wire or a hanger to put in it to help it stay open/maintain its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed with her cat cave. She loves to lay inside of it and will also squash it down and lay on top of it. Honestly, she has adjusted all of her sleeping habits to lay on/in it more than any other spot around the apartment. We joke that it was just the trick we needed to keep her off the couch! Also, the cave came with a little wool ball that is her new favorite toy. We don't truly get why but her obsession with this product is real.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: because she is happily sniffing the cave
customer_reviews.text: My lovely furr-girl immediately climbed in this, rather than the box it came in, which tells you a lot. It is very well-constructed, and I'm sure it will last for years. Further, she just loves the smell apparently, because she is happily sniffing the cave. To give you an idea about size-- my kitty is a very large, fluffy tuxedo, maybe 15 pounds, and she has enough room in there for my other cat. Not that she is going to let him in there! I'm buying my little one his own cave!
customer_reviews.author: Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Cosy, Good looking and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly like the picture. Color and size. I took it out of the box, shake it a little to give it its shape. And my cats were interested right away. Large enough for adult cats, even 2 (if they like being cozy). They love it!!! It seams to be very good quality product. And it actually looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Perrin Rancourt

customer_reviews.title: Our both cats love their new pod
customer_reviews.text: Our both cats love their new pod! We thought we might have to use it as a collapsed bed - so that kitties sleep on top of it, because they have a little house in a cat tree and they never use it. Surprisingly with this pod, they both love to go inside and relax there. It's spacious - we have one bigger cat and he fits there and still has some room left. And it feels good that they sleep on natural materials.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana D.

customer_reviews.title: This bed is made out of really quality materials and very sturdy. I recommend it for anyone with a furbaby ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed! He hopped into it immediately and settled in (then promptly decided he wanted to lay down on top of it instead). This bed is made out of really quality materials and very sturdy. I recommend it for anyone with a furbaby who likes hidey-holes like this cave provides.
customer_reviews.author: J. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: Great construction. Quality fabric. Large enough for the adult cat and kitten. Our Westie can even fit in it, although it is really snug! The kitten loves to play in it also. Have gotten compliments from visitors on how cute it is. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for cats to sleep in here
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wool cat cave for 5 days now but they cats don't sleep here,they went in and tried it out but not for more than a couple minutes once. I'm hoping they will start to use this, at the price it would be hard to take if they didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 of these for my outside friends and they LOVE THEM! Although I keep going out to open ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my outside friends and they LOVE THEM! Although I keep going out to open them up the feral cats seem to prefer them smashed down flat (not like the cave). Even in the winter they seem to like sitting on them flat. I do provide heated kitty tubes for them so maybe they don't need the "cave".
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Galles

product_meta.title: Twin Critters - Handcrafted Cat Cave Bed (Large) I Ecofriendly Cat Cave I Felted from 100% Natural Merino Wool I Handmade Pod for Cats and Kittens I Warm and Cozy cat Bed
feature_bullets: ✅ LARGE CAT CAVE: Cats love this spacious hideaway! Our merino wool cat cave offers plenty of space for cats of all sizes. This cozy nook provides shelter for baby kittens, and large Maine Coons.
✅ HANDCRAFTED: Each twin critters cat cave is carefully handcrafted in Nepal. We want to make sure that your furry friend feels safe and sound - that’s why we use 100% all-natural New Zealand wool.
✅ CHEMICAL-FREE: This large cat bed is made without harsh chemicals. Using an ancient technique called felting, artisans mold each KittiKubbi with the help of water, soap, and merino wool.
✅ ULTRA COMFORTABLE: Our felted wool cat cave is super soft, and ultra-durable. The great thing about this woolen hideaway is that it keeps your kitty warm in the winter, and cool in the summer.
✅ CAN ALSO BE USED AS A MAT: This handcrafted cat cave bed may be used in several ways. Primarily, it functions as a cozy cat cave but you can also flatten it, and turn it into a padded kitty mat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
